resource: 1002113.vtc=true 1002113.description=HAC is designed to help minimize backward rolling on steep ascents. It is not a substitute for safe driving judgment and practices. Factors including grade, surface conditions and driver input can all affect whether HAC will be effective in preventing a loss of control. Please see your Owner's Manual for further details. 1002113.derived=false 1002113.source=MANUAL_IMPORT
